ID: C1KIYT9_00
From: Internal News <ONE.Chalhoub@chalhoub.com>

CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-01-08 16:24
Subject: Dubai Corporate Games, Signing a Strategic Partnership With Arabian Alesaar in KSA, PUIG Joins Our Portfolio in Qatar, Chalhoub University Team, Our Tribute to the Region & Internal Job Opportunities
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/o_GGWo3jP0qrqRKwpVC-Nw/544502/4C7433AD8F37E0FA9D7A0F760761734E/top-banner-eng.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/o_GGWo3jP0qrqRKwpVC-Nw/550757/5ED2566CCB5ECAD7EB825B9F50127381/image-21-1.jpg> 	

We’re kicking off 2025 with the Dubai Corporate Games!


Dubai Corporate Games are starting soon and we want you to be part of it!

Mark your calendars for February 15th and 16th, 2025, and join us at the Inspiratus District, Dubai Sports City, for an exciting two-day event filled with sports, teamwork, and fun. The event welcomes everyone across the Group—regardless of age, gender, fitness level, or vertical.

Register now! <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252farticle%252fwe-re-kicking-off-2025-with-the-dubai-corporate-games%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXY7fQAs4x095DqYnDfDIkRYHcdDqDJG%252fFI1%252fQKrskg3OZP13wgcysbKt9keqfGs2xLnxf3wEYeGJhsD0S2cZcXqsPp2iSUx2sDm%252blYicUfuDRGLiwJjmu%252fHVGWHi25BX%252fUswoWieOffMMpSUZgVvITnRrYAEBm7PzQNCpnXa3IFK8pfTTA30ME4%252bcN9T3FQjcZhbwR6n0MVQVWtpvnfI1dAzhQaF%252bLqQAE5sMT63M4h&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C9d70027e71204e38969408dd2fdf6ddd%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638719358844616946%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=5vltNL8ZXChfQW3vx0AYMhTP4a6F9H0mzqTx52p0ybk%3D&reserved=0>

46%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=5vltNL8ZXChfQW3vx0AYMhTP4a6F9H0mzqTx52p0ybk%3D&reserved=0> 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/o_GGWo3jP0qrqRKwpVC-Nw/544527/EC71CDB837627227C5B1E3FED492ADBF/nuggets-05.png> 	

SIGNING A STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP WITH ARABIAN ALESAAR

The Group signed a strategic partnership agreement with Arabian AlEsaar in KSA.

The agreement aims to bring of our brands to AlShubaily Grand Mall, including: Tory Burch, Michael Kors, Lacoste, Faces ,Guess, Swarovski, L’occitane, Rayban and many more. 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/o_GGWo3jP0qrqRKwpVC-Nw/550753/76FC7004915BA69DADD2A1000DB53D71/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-79.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/o_GGWo3jP0qrqRKwpVC-Nw/545334/2548F16A536A7ED23B7B87C9FE842C82/nuggets-39.png> 	

PUIG JOINS OUR PORTFOLIO IN QATAR 

The Group officially acquires the distribution & retail rights for PUIG in Qatar! PUIG portfolio hosts brands like Carolina Herrera, Paco Rabanne, Jean Paul Gaultier, Rabanne, Christian Louboutin and more. This marks a significant step in our mission to bring exceptional products and experiences to our customers. Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252fpost%252fODEz%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXY7fQAs4x095DqYnDfDIkRYHcdDqDJG%252fFI1%252fQKrskg3OZP13wgcysbKt9keqfGs2xLnxf3wEYeGJhsD0S2cZcXqsPp2iSUx2sDm%252blYicUfuDRGLiwJjmu%252fHVGWHi25BX%252fUswoWieOffMMpSUZgVvITnRrYAEBm7PzQNCpnXa3IFK8pfTTA30ME4%252bcN9T3FQjcZhbwR6n0MVQVWtpvnfI1dAzhQaF%252bLqQAE5sMT63M4h&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C9d70027e71204e38969408dd2fdf6ddd%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638719358844644183%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=lsEiXolfPrxlidlDrVa%2F5TkBYorp5Opu%2BQapMywOlio%3D&reserved=0>

LOOKING AHEAD | CHALHOUB UNIVERSITY TEAM

As we step into a new year, we took a moment to look back and asked the Chalhoub University team to reflect on 2024 in just a few words—what they’re most grateful for. 

The result? Honest, heartfelt, and a true celebration of everything we’ve shared and accomplished together.

Watch now <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252fpost%252fODEy%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXY7fQAs4x095DqYnDfDIkRYHcdDqDJG%252fFI1%252fQKrskg3OZP13wgcysbKt9keqfGs2xLnxf3wEYeGJhsD0S2cZcXqsPp2iSUx2sDm%252blYicUfuDRGLiwJjmu%252fHVGWHi25BX%252fUswoWieOffMMpSUZgVvITnRrYAEBm7PzQNCpnXa3IFK8pfTTA30ME4%252bcN9T3FQjcZhbwR6n0MVQVWtpvnfI1dAzhQaF%252bLqQAE5sMT63M4h&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C9d70027e71204e38969408dd2fdf6ddd%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638719358844663583%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ts7SBheWsfeLenw1t3SePAlsdmm%2FaiUOo531MD9SSYQ%3D&reserved=0>

BE PART OF OUR TRIBUTE TO THE REGION

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/o_GGWo3jP0qrqRKwpVC-Nw/550690/7027AB3A1F168AD59CDE7FE869455A58/chalhoub-sports-day-14.gif> 	
Share your favorite high-quality photos that highlight the charm of Bilad Al Sham. The best ones will be featured in our 2024 Sustainability Report!

Steps to participate:
1. Choose a beautiful nature or cultural photo that was taken by YOU in Palestine, Lebanon, Syria, & Jordan.
2. Ensure the image you choose does not include people.
3. Post your image on One Chalhoub,  <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.onechalhoub.com%2Fredir%2Ft%3Fs%3Dhttps%253a%252f%252fonechalhoub.connexionsnow.com%252f%26t%3DU9SNiJg0GQTL7hVYOSWdyJuc%252fgGnWD4VMSwo7%252by4NfkA1kd2MqmJGffoONiqaUeTdgNvL4YBPB%252by%252fkAoxurgWXY7fQAs4x095DqYnDfDIkRYHcdDqDJG%252fFI1%252fQKrskg3OZP13wgcysbKt9keqfGs2xLnxf3wEYeGJhsD0S2cZcXqsPp2iSUx2sDm%252blYicUfuDRGLiwJjmu%252fHVGWHi25BX%252fUswoWieOffMMpSUZgVvITnRrYAEBm7PzQNCpnXa3IFK8pfTTA30ME4%252bcN9T3FQjcZhbwR6n0MVQVWtpvnfI1dAzhQaF%252bLqQAE5sMT63M4h&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C9d70027e71204e38969408dd2fdf6ddd%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638719358844677906%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=T7oRQGmDA2ImZQ2jmuA2Kr6ZGq7UC6Ysl%2BhGJXkwDfM%3D&reserved=0> with the Hashtag #TributeToOurRegion

3D YEAR-END TOWNHALL: REFLECT, REWARD & RECHARGE

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/o_GGWo3jP0qrqRKwpVC-Nw/550760/81740DDD2E3281E32C1C96FF7E6ACD66/asdfdgimage001.jpg> 	
The 3d Year-End Townhall brought together team members to reflect, strategise, and celebrate. 

Spanning three days, the event was packed with insightful discussions covering current processes, goals, and areas for improvement, forward-thinking innovative proposals for 2025, and team building activities. Lastly, team members were rewarded and recognised for their outstanding contributions and achievements.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/o_GGWo3jP0qrqRKwpVC-Nw/545544/271F7BCABB357369B71FA2E0E1EA8C63/nuggets-52.png> 	

OUR LATEST INTERNAL JOB OPPORTUNITIES
